definition: component in Chinese characters, occurring in 青, 毒, 素 etc/see also 青字頭|青字头[qing1 zi4 tou2]

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare the helicid hydrophile matrix tablet.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备神衰果素亲水凝胶缓释骨架片。

sentences.english: I enjoyed a plain steamed dumpling as a very nice morning treat.
sentences.chinese: 我吃的是素包子，清晨的盛宴。

sentences.english: Morning Star Farms makes vegetarian buffalo wings, BBQ ribs, and meatless meatballs.
sentences.chinese: 晨星农场提供水牛城素辣鸡翅，烤素肋骨，和素肉圆。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare apigenin (AP) solid dispersion and measure its dissolution in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备芹菜素固体分散体，并检测其体外溶出度。

sentences.english: Pheromones clearly act as sexual attractants in the animal world.
sentences.chinese: 信息素在动物世界里是种致命吸引物。

sentences.english: To observe and compare the antithrombotic effects of myricetin dispersible tablets and myricetin dripping pills.
sentences.chinese: 观察并比较杨梅素滴丸与杨梅素分散片的抗血栓作用。

sentences.english: To observe and compare the antithrombotic effects of myricetin dispersible tablets and myricetin dripping pills.
sentences.chinese: 观察并比较杨梅素滴丸与杨梅素分散片的抗血栓作用。

sentences.english: Stores and warehouses should monitor populations with pheromone traps.
sentences.chinese: 仓储过程中应使用信息素诱捕器进行监测。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The finding suggested that enterohepatic circulation of gastrodin did not exist in rats.
sentences.chinese: 结论天麻素在大鼠体内不存在肠肝循环。

sentences.english: Objective:To prepare myricetin dispersible tablets and investigate its related properties.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备杨梅素分散片并对其相关性能进行考察。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Progress in different routes of administration and formulations for Hirudin are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 目的阐述水蛭素不同给药途径及相关剂型的研究进展。

sentences.english: But I wouldn't be the first to use Botox medicinally.
sentences.chinese: 但我不会是使用肉毒杆菌素做医疗用途的第一人。

sentences.english: The mating type genes in B loci contain multiple pheromone and pheromone receptors.
sentences.chinese: 而B位点的交配型基因编码信息素及其受体。

sentences.english: How about reports of the dangers of Botox?
sentences.chinese: 对肉毒杆菌素的研究报告怎么样？

sentences.english: Consuming too much sodium cyclamate can harm the liver.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，甜蜜素食用过多会伤肝。

definition: to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
